yogataḥ pi na asti

original: vṛttito 'pi nāsti sarvākārajñateti carati vikalpe carati |
analyzed: vṛttitaḥ pi na asti sarva ākāra jña tā iti carati vikalpe carati
vijñaptimātrā sarva ākāra jña tā iti carati vikalpe carati
yathā sarva ākārajña tā na asti tathā sarva ākārajña tā pratibhā

original: sā vijñaptir api nāstīti carati vikalpe carati |
analyzed: sā vijñaptiḥ api na asti iti carati vikalpe carati

original: yataś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathaiva sarvākārajñatān nopalabhate |
analyzed: yatas ca bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ yathā eva sarva ākāra jña tān na upalabhate
tathā eva tad pratibhāsām api vijñaptin na upalabhate

original: na ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ tadvijñaptiṃ vipraṇāśayati |
analyzed: na ca sarveṇa sarvam tat vijñaptim vipraṇāśayati

original: na cānyatra tadvijñapter anyaṃ kañcid dharmam upalabhate |
analyzed: na ca anyatra tad vijñapteḥ anyam kañcid dharmam upalabhate

original: abhā(vataś ca tāṃ vijñaptiṃ na samanupaśyati |
analyzed: abhāvataḥ ca tām vijñaptim na samanupaśyati
na ca anyatra
pteḥ abhāvam samanupaśyati
na ca tasyāḥ vijñapteḥ abhāvam
tayā vijñaptyā eka tvena samanupaśyati
na pṛthaktvena samanupaśyati

original: na ca tasyā vijñapter abhāvaṃ bhāvataḥ samanupaśyatu |
analyzed: na ca tasyāḥ vijñapteḥ abhāvam bhāvataḥ samanupaśyatu
na abhāvataḥ samanupaśyati

original: ebhiḥ kulaputrāḥ sarvākāraiḥ sarvavikalpair yo na vika(lpayaty ayam avikalpadharmadhātur iti na samanupaśyati |)
analyzed: ebhiḥ kula putrāḥ sarva ākāraiḥ sarva vikalpaiḥ yaḥ na vikalpayati ayam a vikalpa dharmadhātuḥ iti na samanupaśyati
evam ayam praveśa nayaḥ vikalpasya dhātoḥ

original: evaṃ hi kulaputrā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vikalpadhātupratiṣṭito bhavati |
analyzed: evam hi kula putrāḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ vikalpadhātu pratiṣṭitaḥ bhavati

original: (asya kulaputrā dharmaparyāyasya udgrahaṇalekhanavācanād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ nanv eva gaṅgānadīvālukopamātmabhāvaparityāgasya nanve eva gaṃgānadīvālukopamalokādhātuparipūrṇaratnadānasya  #
analyzed: asya kula putrāḥ dharmaparyāyasya udgrahaṇa lekhana vācanāt bahutaram puṇyam nanu eva gaṅgā nadī vālukā upama ātmabhāva parityāgasya eva gaṃgā nadī vālukā upama lokādhātu paripūrṇa ratna dānasya
nanu eva gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamalpka dhātu paripūrṇa tathāgata biṃba kārāpaṇa puṇya skandhasya iti

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ ime gāthe abhāṣata ||
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām ime gāthe abhāṣata
avikalpa āsayaḥ bhūtvā saddharme smin jina ātmajaḥ
vikalpa durgam vyatītya kramāt niṣkalpam āpnute
praśāntam acalam śreṣṭham vaśa
varti sama asamam
avikalpa sukham tasmāt bodhisattvaḥ dhigacchati

original: idam avocad bahgavān āttamanā avikalpaprabhāsaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato  #
analyzed: idam avocat bahgavān āttamanāḥ avikalpaprabhāsaḥ ca bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad sa deva mānuṣa asura gandharvaḥ ca lokaḥ bhagavataḥ
bhāṣitam abhyanandan iti
